title.narrative: Health districts and municipalities are able to prevent and respond to cholera outbreaks in the target areas

description.narrative: During the reporting period, the resources of the program to prevent and response to cholera outbreak and other water, sanitation and hygiene related diseases were mainly focused on COVID19. The strategy and proactive intervention implemented contributed to the control of the spreading of COVID19 pandemic and mobilization of other sector players across the country in general and in about 21 Health Districts specifically. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020
